mapper.sql: schedulefileid, scheduleid, deviceid, uploadtype, filetype, fileid, filename, fileuri, filesize, md5, complete, status, description, createtime, updatetime
mapper.select: select count(1) from schedulefile where scheduleid = ${scheduleid}
select * from schedulefile where filetype = '${filetype}' and deviceid = ${deviceid} and fileid = ${fileid}
select * from schedulefile where scheduleid = ${scheduleid} and complete != 100 order by fileid desc
select floor(coalesce(sum(filesize*complete/100),0)) from schedulefile where scheduleid = ${scheduleid} and filetype='3';
mapper.delete: delete from schedulefile where schedulefileid in (#{ids})
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as schedulefileid
insert into schedulefile (scheduleid, deviceid, uploadtype, filetype, fileid, filename, fileuri, filesize, md5, complete, status, description, createtime, updatetime) values (#{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uploadtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{filetype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fileid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileuri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filesize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update schedulefile
scheduleid = #{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deviceid = #{deviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
uploadtype = #{uploadtype,jdbcType=CHAR},
filetype = #{filetype,jdbcType=CHAR},
fileid = #{fileid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fileuri = #{fileuri,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filesize = #{filesize,jdbcType=BIGINT},
md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
complete = #{complete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where schedulefileid = #{schedulefileid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update schedulefile set scheduleid = #{scheduleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deviceid = #{deviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uploadtype = #{uploadtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, filetype = #{filetype,jdbcType=CHAR}, fileid = #{fileid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, filename = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fileuri = #{fileuri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filesize = #{filesize,jdbcType=BIGINT}, md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, complete = #{complete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where schedulefileid = #{schedulefileid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
